title: A series of proposed changes to a repository.

targetBranch.description: Name of the SCM branch that the changeset intends to merge into.

createdOn.description: The date-time when the changeset was created, in ISO 8601 format.

uploadedBy.description: Identifier of the user who originally uploaded the changeset.

commitMessage.description: The commit message that will be used when the changeset is merged into the target branch.

state.description: Indicator of the current state of the changeset.
